summary: Improves the appearance of this solitary vagabond making her a potential wife.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/2648/beautifulcairinei.jpg[/img]

Description
======================
Greatly improves the face of the Markarath\'s vagabond Cairine to make her good-looking for marriage and/or companion usage. It does not changes the NPC\'s stats or body, just her face. I recommend using the mods shown below to get the complete Beautiful Cairine experience.


Install
======================
Use NMM or simply extract in Skyrim/Data folder. Then activate the .esp and that\'s all.


Uninstall
======================
Delete Beautiful Cairine.esp
Delete Data/Textures/Actor/Character/Facegendata/Facetint/Skyrim.esm/000d66fe.dds
Delete Meshes/Actors/Character/Facegendata/Facegeom/Skyrim.esm/000d66fe.nif


Recommended mods
======================
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition by Caliente: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

Multiple Marriages and Changing Spouse Outfits by Dudestia: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9378

Female Press Out The Wrinkles and Forehead by tjrgytjq:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=124

Improved NPC Clothing by BaronDavid:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2674


Tools used
======================
NPC Editor v1.70 Beta 2 by foretrenty:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4554


Credits
======================
Bethesda for creating TES saga.
All the authors of the recommended mods.
foretrenty for his great tool.

My apologies for my bad English, im spain native.
author: SombraD
